history.proof: intros x. unfold PSeries. qsimpl use: PSeries_eq. qsimpl use: PSeries_eq,Series_scal_r. qsimpl use: PSeries_eq,Rmult_0_r,Series_scal_r. hecrush depth: 3.

exceptions.exn: The LHS of PSeries_eq (PSeries _ _) does not match any subterm of the goal
The LHS of Series_scal_r (Series (fun n : nat => _ n * _)) does not match any subterm of the goal
The LHS of Rmult_0_r (_ * 0) does not match any subterm of the goal

In environment H3 : forall (c : R) (a : nat -> R), Series (fun n : nat => a n * c) = Series a * c H2 : forall r : R, r * 0 = 0 H : forall (a : nat -> R) (x : R), PSeries a x = Series (fun k : nat => scal (pow_n x k) (a k)) x : R Unable to unify "0" with "Series (fun k : nat => 0 * x ^ k)".

original: intros x. unfold PSeries. rewrite PSeries_eq. rewrite Series_scal_r. simpl. rewrite Rmult_0_r. reflexivity.
